key.name: window-match
key.description: Window types that should be handled by Trailfocus (match)

key.name: windows-count
key.description: Number of windows Trailfocus will keep track of. Windows that had focus this amount of windows ago or more will be considered completly unfocused. (1 - 150)

key.name: windows-start
key.description: This defines when Trailfocus will start fading windows. This lets you set up trailfocus to treat the N first Windows as fully focused. (1 - 20)

key.name: max-opacity
key.description: Opacity of the currently focused window. Windows will get opacity levels between the focused and minimum. (1 - 100)

key.name: min-opacity
key.description: Opacity of the least focused window. Windows will get opacity levels between the focused and minimum. (1 - 100)

key.name: max-brightness
key.description: Brightness of the currently focused window. Windows will get brightness levels between the focused and minimum. (1 - 100)

key.name: min-brightness
key.description: Brightness of the least focused window. Windows will get brightness levels between the focused and minimum. (1 - 100)

key.name: max-saturation
key.description: Saturation of the currently focused window. Windows will get saturation levels between the focused and minimum. (1 - 100)

key.name: min-saturation
key.description: Saturation of the least focused window. Windows will get saturation levels between the focused and minimum. (1 - 100)
